DOC.brief_title: Text Messaging Smoking Cessation College Health Clinics
DOC.criteria: Aged 18 24 year Enrolled full/part time college student A current smoker ( Have smoke 100 cigarette lifetime smoke every day day ) Englishspeaking Interested quit Have cell phone personal use unlimited text messaging plan . History hypersensitivity/allergy nicotine patch ; Serious arrhythmia History heart disease ( myocardial infarction , severe chest pain , coronary artery disease ) Current pregnancy/breastfeeding/plan pregnancy
